name: Bobby Yeung
title: Software Developer
summary: Software developer with ~5 years’ experience building highly available, scalable RESTful services and internal platforms for B2B/B2C clients in education and e‑commerce. Experienced in AI/RAG agents, admission systems, digital signage and e‑commerce platforms, covering complex business rules, RBAC, tenant‑level data isolation and 3rd‑party integrations.
